title: cannellini mash
ingredients: 1 can cannellini beans; drained and rinsed
2 large pieces of rustic bread; toasted
instructions: Add beans, olive oil and red pepper flakes to a medium pan over medium heat. Cook (confit) the beans for 5–10 minutes while stirring occasionally until most of the moisture is gone, making sure nothing is overcooked (i.e. dried out) or burned.

Roughly mash with a wooden spoon and take off heat. Add 1/4 of a lemon’s juice and taste, checking for acid and salt/msg. Put half on each slice of the well toasted bread and top with capers and some cracks of pepper.
Serve with a couple de-seeded lemon wedges, sprinkle with parsley if using.
notes: Goes well with a side of broiled asparagus.
